items.title: Better MVVM with MVVM Helpers (or Xamarin Community Toolkit)
items.description:
Let's take our MVVM to the next level with some great helper libraries that can be used in any application including Xamarin, Xamarin.Forms, WPF, UWP, and more! With MVVM Helpers you are able to easily get access to property change notifications, base viewmodels, helpers utilities, and optimizations around observable collections.

Better MVVM with MVVM Helpers (or Xamarin Community Toolkit) by James Montemagno
items.description_markdown:

items.title: Cross Platform Images in Xamarin.Forms
items.description:
Cross-platform images in Xamarin.Forms has been historically complicated. You need to provide all the different resolution sizes for the platforms your app supports. But it's getting easier and in this short video, David shows you the way!

Cross Platform Images in Xamarin.Forms by David Ortinau
items.description_markdown:
Cross-platform images in Xamarin.Forms has been historically complicated. You need to provide all the different resolution sizes for the platforms your app supports. But it's getting easier and in this short video, David shows you the way!
